# `pwd` for [default](/commands/categories/default.md)

<div class='command-title'>Return the current working directory</div>

## Signature

```> pwd {flags} ```

## Flags

 -  `--physical, -P`: Resolve symbolic links


## Input/output types:

| input | output |
| ----- | ------ |
| any   | any    |
